name: typhoon
description: Typhoon is a trustless protocol designed to maintain privacy without compromising on compliance
author: justin@moonchute.xyz

scripts.build:circuit:compile: npm run build:circuit:compile:commitment && npm run build:circuit:compile:blacklist
scripts.build:circuit:setup:commitment: snarkjs groth16 setup build/circuits/commitment.r1cs powersOfTau28_hez_final_21.ptau build/circuits/circuit_commitment_0.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute build/circuits/circuit_commitment_0.zkey build/circuits/circuit_commitment_1.zkey --name="Typhoon" -v && snarkjs zkey beacon build/circuits/circuit_commitment_1.zkey build/circuits/circuit_commitment_final.zkey 0102030405060708090a0b0c0d0e0f101112131415161718191a1b1c1d1e1f 10 -n="Final Beacon phase2" && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/circuits/circuit_commitment_final.zkey build/circuits/commitment_verification_key.json
scripts.build:circuit:setup:blacklist: snarkjs groth16 setup build/circuits/notInBlacklist.r1cs powersOfTau28_hez_final_21.ptau build/circuits/circuit_not_in_blacklist_0.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute build/circuits/circuit_not_in_blacklist_0.zkey build/circuits/circuit_not_in_blacklist_1.zkey --name="Typhoon" -v && snarkjs zkey beacon build/circuits/circuit_not_in_blacklist_1.zkey build/circuits/circuit_not_in_blacklist_final.zkey 0102030405060708090a0b0c0d0e0f101112131415161718191a1b1c1d1e1f 10 -n="Final Beacon phase2"  && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/circuits/circuit_not_in_blacklist_final.zkey build/circuits/not_in_blacklist_verification_key.json
scripts.build:circuit:setup: npm run build:circuit:setup:commitment && npm run build:circuit:setup:blacklist
scripts.build:circuit:contract: npm run build:circuit:contract:commitment && npm run build:circuit:contract:blacklist
scripts.build:circuit: mkdir -p build/circuits && npm run build:circuit:compile && npm run build:circuit:setup && npm run build:circuit:contract
scripts.build: npm run build:circuit && npm run build:contract
